kriptos.title: Frontend Developer & Cybersecurity Analyst (Contract)
bullets: Built frontend for Update Manager platform enabling enterprise clients (including Latin American banks) to deploy and monitor Windows security agents across thousands of endpoints. Delivered 37,000+ lines of production TypeScript/React (primary contributor to core repository) implementing real-time agent status monitoring, automated deployment workflows, and role-based access controls.

Managed vulnerability remediation for SOC 2 Type II certification, triaging findings from automated scans (SonarCloud, Amazon Inspector, Hexstrike) across 220+ repositories and coordinating resolution with development teams. Implemented security fixes in primary frontend repository (authentication flows, dependency updates, input validation) while maintaining feature delivery schedule.

Reduced pre-commit hook runtime by 50% by configuring selective test execution on changed files only (full test suite still runs on merge to main). Refined existing Mock Service Worker (MSW) setup into coherent mocked backend layer with schema definitions, enabling frontend work to proceed while backend APIs were being developed and providing precise API contracts for faster iteration.

markatzy.title: Founder & Lead Developer
markatzy.dates: Jan 2023 - Present (Full-time 2023-2024, part-time while at Kriptos 2024-Present)
bullets: Founded SaaS platform solving trademark conflict detection problem identified during IP law practice. Now serving IP law firms in Ecuador. For a mid-sized firm with 100 brands, platform automates 170,000+ monthly comparisons and applies DuPont factor analysis to filter results down to single-digit percentages, allowing attorneys to focus exclusively on genuine conflicts.

Built full-stack web application (TypeScript/React/Next.js) with multi-dimensional AI-powered conflict detection: semantic similarity (OpenAI embeddings + pgvector HNSW), phonetic matching (Double Metaphone + IPA scoring), and typographic analysis. Implemented two-tier search architecture achieving 60-100ms end-to-end latency across hundreds of thousands of database entries (Tier 1 Metaphone filtering in 1-32ms, Tier 2 IPA phonetic + typographic scoring in 57-97ms). Parallel batch processing scales to millions of comparisons monthly across organizations.

Engineered event-driven data pipeline for trademark data ingestion with background job processing. Implemented data validation, deduplication, and multi-stage enrichment workflows (IPA phonetic forms, semantic embeddings, Metaphone indexing) ensuring data quality for conflict detection accuracy.

about.title: About me
about.p1: As a lawyer with experience building and securing applications and automations, I'm uniquely qualified to bridge the gap between legal compliance and technical implementation. I build custom software and workflows that solve bottlenecks while keeping you compliant with local and international regulations. From data security to digital infrastructure, I guide you through the complexities so you can focus on what matters.
about.p2: What have I built? A variety of things, from enterprise custom software to internal tools and e-commerce platforms. Markatzy, an AI-powered platform using RAG architecture to automate trademark monitoring and legal defence. Websites for businesses of all sizes, tailored to their needs with privacy and security at the core. At Kriptos, I supported SOC 2 Type II certification by monitoring security controls and triaging vulnerabilities, then transitioned to the dev team where I delivered 37,000+ lines of production code for the Update Manager module. My toolkit? Legal expertise, experience working at the edge of what's possible with today's tech, a cybersecurity postgraduate diploma from UT Austin, software engineering and cybersecurity diplomas from BrainStation (Konrad Group), a financial accounting certificate from HBS Online, a cloud certification from AWS, ongoing training for CompTIA Security+, and an obsession with efficiency.
about.p3: Outside of work, I'm an explorer and the outdoorsy type. Long-distance running, volcano hikes, and easy days at the beach with my wife.

markatzy.name: Markatzy
markatzy.label: Legal AI SaaS
markatzy.description: AI-powered trademark protection platform with real-time, multi-dimensional conflict detection. Analyzes brands across phonetic (IPA-based, cross-language), typographic, semantic (vector embeddings), and visual dimensions. Searches over half a million trademarks in under 100ms with enterprise-grade security (rate limiting, row-level data isolation). A-rated in SonarQube for maintainability, reliability, and security. Built with RAG architecture (Retrieval-Augmented Generation), Next.js 15, type-safe APIs (tRPC), vector databases (pgvector), and OpenAI for intelligent conflict analysis.
